page.title: 08A School Day
page.content: In the morning I get up at 7 go to the bathroom, get washed, then I get dressed and go downstairs. My Mam makes my breakfast which is normally "Kellogs Start" then I get my bag ready for school. I get the number 7 bus at Bedeburn Road and get off at Hillheads Road. I go to chapel Park Middle School. The bell rings at 8.55. We usually have four lessons a day. In a week we mostly have Maths., English, Environmental studies, Science and French, but we also have Music, Art, Health, Homecraft, Craft Design Technology, Games and R.E. We have our dinner break from 11.55 until 12.55. At 3.30 the bell rings for home time. When I get home I do my homework then I have my tea. I play outside for an hour and then watch television before going to bed at 10.
